solution_line_template: Micah drank {morning_liters} x {afternoon_multiplier} = <<{morning_liters}*{afternoon_multiplier}={afternoon_liters}>>{afternoon_liters} liters in the afternoon.
She drank a total of {morning_liters} + {afternoon_liters} = <<{morning_liters}+{afternoon_liters}={total_liters}>>{total_liters} liters of water.
